Class ChakNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChakNode

  • public class ChakNode
extends java.lang.Object
    A ChakNode is my implementation of a Gnutella servant. A servant is a node within a peer-to-peer network which provides a client-interface allowing for users to issue queries and view/receieve results. A servant can simultaneously accept queries from other users (i.e. servents make up the peer-to-peer network).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChakNode.ConnectionListener
      This thread is responsible for constantly listening to different requests from different nodes and acts appropriately to the defined protocols.
      class  ChakNode.DiscoveryThread
      The following thread will constantly looking to fill the neighbors list while maximum capacity has not been reached and it is also responsible for the periodic pinging of the neighbor ChakNodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChakNode()
      Creates a ChakNode with ip address of localhost (127.0.0.1) and the first available port, also initializes serverSocket so the node can begin the discovery phase.
      ChakNode(int port)
      Creates a ChakNode with ip address of localhost (127.0.0.1) and with a provided port, also initializes serverSocket so the node can begin the discovery phase.

        java.lang.Exception - if port is in use.

      • ChakNode

        public ChakNode(int port)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a ChakNode with ip address of localhost (127.0.0.1) and with a provided port, also initializes serverSocket so the node can begin the discovery phase.
        Parameters:
        port - user provided port to begin listening on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if port is in use.

      • ping

        public boolean ping(int port)
        Used to actively discover hosts on the network. A servant receiving a Ping descriptor is expected to respond with one or more Pong descriptors.
        Parameters:
        port - to send ping to
        Returns:
        a boolean notifying the node pinging if the ping was successful

      • beginFileSearch

        public void beginFileSearch(java.lang.String searchCriteria)

        Parameters:
        searchCriteria - is the string which will be searched for
